description: This Dart file defines the SettingsController class which manages application settings such as theme mode. It interacts with a SettingsRepository for data persistence and notifies listeners about changes.

classes.name: SettingsController
classes.description: Controller for application settings like theme mode, utilizing ChangeNotifier for state management.

methods.name: loadThemeMode
methods.description: Loads the theme mode setting from persistent storage, defaults to light theme if not set.

methods.name: setThemeMode
methods.description: Sets and persists the theme mode, updates listeners.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets settings to default state, specifically theme mode to light.
